content: That's a great idea about incorporating elements of sustainability into my patio area. I think adding a small herb garden would be a great way to utilize the compost I've been making in my backyard. I've also been considering adding a rainwater harvesting system to collect rainwater for watering my garden and herbs. Do you have any suggestions on how to design a patio area that incorporates both a fire pit and a seating area, while also leaving space for an herb garden and a rainwater harvesting system?
